title: Apple | ICT3 | Hyderabad
content:
Education: B. Tech
Years of Experience: 5.3
Prior Experience: SDE II (Frontend)
Current Company: Unicorn Startup
Current Compensation: 40 LPA(Fixed) + 40 Lacks (Esops over 4 years)

Company : Apple
Title: Sofware Engineer - ICT3
Location: Hyderabad
Base: 30 LPA
Bonus: Yearly bonus 5%
EPF: 1.8lakhs
RSU's : 92400 divided into 4 years (19) lakhs per year
Joining Bonus: 3L
Benefits: Standard Apple Benefits.
Total Compensation: Base Salary + Bonus + EPF + JB + Stock Options = 30 LPA + 1.5 L + 1.5 L + 3 L + 19 L = 55 LPA for first year

52 LPA for second year.
salaryTotal: : Base Salary + Bonus + Epf + Jb + Stock Options = 30 Lpa + 1.5 L + 1.5 L + 3 L + 19 L = 55 Lpa For First Year

title: ITC Limited | SDE 1 | India | 2023
content:
Education: B.Tech from IIIT Lucknow in Computer Science 2023 grad
Years of Experience: Fresher
Prior Experience: Interned at Amazon (6 months)
Date of the Offer: August 2023
Company: ITC Limited
Title/Level: Software Developer 1
Location: Bengaluru, India
Salary: INR 9,60,000
Relocation: N/A
Signing Bonus: INR 1,00,000
Stock bonus: N/A
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to INR 85,000 every year
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ INR 12,54,000 (Including PF & Other benefits like LTA etc.)
Benefits: Total 30 annual leaves
salaryTotal: : ~ Inr 12,54,000 (including Pf & Other Benefits Like Lta Etc.)
